snippet: Sofia Russo said that the death of her daughter, Ariel, could have been prevented if there had not been a delay in dispatching an emergency vehicle to the accident site.
abstract: Sofia Russo, mother of 4-year-old girl who was struck and killed by car in Manhattan, says she intends to file lawsuit against New York City and city's Police and Fire Departments; claims her daughter's death could have been avoided had emergency vehicles not been delayed in their response; family will seek $20 million in damages
lead_paragraph: Sofia Russo said that the death of her daughter, Ariel, could have been prevented if there had not been a delay in dispatching an emergency vehicle to the accident site.

headline.main: Mother to Sue New York City in Crash That Killed 4-Year-Old Girl
headline.print_headline: Mother to Sue City in Crash That Killed 4-Year-Old Girl
